repairedDockerfile:
FROM mhart/alpine-node:6 
RUN apk add --no-cache git 
RUN npm install -g node-gyp gatsby@1.0.0-alpha12-alpha.d7d6ef64 && npm cache clean --force;

ENV LC_ALL=C.UTF-8 \  
LANG=en_US.UTF-8 \  
LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 
WORKDIR /srv 
VOLUME /srv 

COPY entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh 
RUN chmod +x /entrypoint.sh 

ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
